hangle: 황태자가 불법 투기장에서 잡혔다는 소식은 순식간에 퍼져나갔다.
first_translate: the news that  the crown prince was caught at an illegal arena spread like wildfire.
everyone from  all corners of high society whispered about his scandalous behavior.

hangle: 이 소식을 들은 황제는 길길이 날뛰었다.
first_translate: and when the emperor heard this news, he became furious.
enoch!!!
this is absolutely humiliating for our family!
how dare you tarnish the honor of the imperial family?!
f-father!

hangle: 전 시그렌 그놈의 함정에 빠진 것입니다!
first_translate: it’s not my fault! I fell into one of siegren's traps!
I don’t want to hear your excuses!
you fool!

hangle: 황자는 황족으로서 불법 투기장을 단속했을 뿐이다.
first_translate: his highness only went there as part of his royal duties to crack down on such places.

hangle: 거기다 클로비스 후작과 힘을 합쳐 국고를 채우는 데 도움까지 주었지!
first_translate: on top of that,  he even helped fill up the national treasury by joining forces with marquess clovis!
now everyone praises him more than ever before!
b-but father--
get out of my sight.

hangle: 당분간 사교계 출입을 엄금하고, 네 성에서 근신하거라!
first_translate: for now, stay away from any social events and remain inside your palace until further notice!
all of this... happened because of her...
she will pay dearly for what she has done...
mark my words...
thank you so much, lady fiona.
thanks to you,  I could reject lord enoch’s marriage proposal.
no need to thank me. after all, we’re friends.
lady livia is always so humble.
after the incident at the arena last time,

hangle: 황태자는 불법 투기장에서 부린 추태가 알려져 근신 처분을 받게 되었다.
first_translate: prince enoch received disciplinary action due to his misbehavior at the illegal fighting ring.
why did things have to turn out this way...?!

hangle: 덕분에 리비아는 큰 문제 없이 청혼서를 거절할 수 있게 되었지.
first_translate: as a result,  lady livia was able to decline the marriage offer without facing any problems.

hangle: 사교계에서는 리비아에 대한 동정론까지 돌고 있다니까.
first_translate: in fact, people feel sorry for her these days.

hangle: 당분간은 가여운 영애 노릇을 좀 해볼까요.
first_translate: let’s play along with their sympathy for a while longer.
that girl really knows how to take advantage of situations...
arendt also seems very satisfied with himself.

hangle: 하긴 그 많은 귀족에게서 재산을 뜯어냈으니.
first_translate: well, he managed to get money from those nobles.
thank you, my lady.
with this amount,  we won’t have to worry about finances anymore.
my lady, are you alright?
pardon? why do you ask?

hangle: 그 일 이후로 황자 전하의 인기가 더욱 올라갔잖아요.
first_translate: didn’t you know? since then, his highness gained even greater popularity among the ladies.
look over here...

hangle: 두 분께서는 교제 중이신 것 같은데, 괜찮으신가요?
first_translate: from what I see,  it looks like the two of you are dating each other. does that bother you?
uh...
not really...?
good heavens...
what a generous soul...
siegren.

hangle: 그 ‘문어 다리 걸친 연인에게 첫사랑이 농락당한 젊은이의 얼굴’은 뭐야?
first_translate: what exactly is “the face of a young man whose first love cheated on him with another guy” look like?

hangle: 저기, 방금까지 예쁜 아가씨들 사이에 있던 건 너거든?
first_translate: hey, weren’t you just surrounded by pretty girls earlier?
if anyone deserves to make that expression, it would be me.
yet clearly,  I’m not making it right now.
argh...

hangle: 나라고 뭐 마음 편하기만 한 줄 아나.
first_translate: do you think I'm happy seeing them together too?

hangle: 애도 아니고 일일이 질투할 순 없으니까 그렇지.
first_translate: of course not. but I can’t act jealous every single time either.
anyway,
has abel contacted us yet?
oh yeah,  I got a letter yesterday.
dear fiona,

hangle: 죽음을 조사한다니, 아무리 너라도 힘들 것 같구나.
first_translate: I know you said you wanted to investigate death itself, but even someone as skilled as yourself might find it difficult.

hangle: 헤일론의 일이 바빠져서 당분간 돌아갈 수 없을 것 같다.
first_translate: things seem busy back home, so I probably won’t return anytime soon.
I won’t stop you if you wish to continue investigating,

hangle: 대신 죽은 땅에서 도움이 될 만한 똥개를 하나 보내마.
first_translate: but instead,  I’ll send you a little puppy dog that may help you during your journey through dead lands.
a puppy dog...
to tell you the truth,  I’m still unsure what he meant by that...

hangle: 그보다 놀라운 게 다음 줄에 쓰여 있지 뭐야.
first_translate: but something else surprised me even more.
additionally,
nicely done regarding recent matters.
I am proud of you.
I hope he comes back sooner rather than later.
is miss fiona missing her teacher already?

hangle: …아벨이 있어야 네 근처에 이상한 놈들이 안 오지.
first_translate: we need abel around to keep weirdos away from you.
true enough.

hangle: 아무튼 투기장 일은 이렇게 잘 끝났고…
first_translate: at least everything turned out well concerning the matter at the arena...
I thought life would go smoothly for some time,
but what in the world is going on now?

hangle: 전 리비아 영애에게 볼일이 있는 게 아닙니다만?
first_translate: I didn’t come looking for lady livia though.
no, no.
lady fiona is quite busy today.
i-it’s fine, lady livia.

hangle: 그리고 지금 도망쳐봤자 후작은 어떻게든 다시 찾아올걸요…
first_translate: besides, running away isn’t gonna solve anything anyway. he’ll eventually catch up to me again...
then...
be careful, my lady.
alright.
I shall cut straight to the point.
tell me, are you human or not?

hangle: 사실 저는 어둠과 관련된 문제로 영애의 정체를 의심하고 있습니다.
first_translate: truthfully speaking,  I suspect you aren’t based on certain issues related to darkness.
what?

hangle: 왜 갑자기 어둠과의 상관관계를 따지는 거지?
first_translate: why bring up darkness all of a sudden?
so you refuse to answer.

hangle: 제게 왜 그런 질문을 하시는지 모르겠는데요.
first_translate: I fail to understand why you’d ask me such questions.

hangle: 의심하고 있는 상대에게 이유를 말할 수는 없겠죠.
first_translate: I cannot reveal my reasons to the person I suspect.
for now,  I'll interpret your silence as my answer.
wait,
hold on a second!
if my question offended you, please forgive me.
that wasn’t my intention--
just what...

hangle: 내가 진짜 피오나가 아니라는 걸 알게 된 건가?
first_translate: does he realize I’m actually not fiona?
but how did he figure that out?

hangle: 답 안 나올걸 생각해봤자 어쩔 수 없어.
first_translate: thinking about it won’t give me answers.
time to focus on work.
I knew they'd contact me soon,
but talk about perfect timing.
still, the situation appears worse than expected...
recently, new areas of land died off.
the scale is several times larger compared to previous cases.

hangle: 게다가 일부는 마을이었던 터라 인명 피해까지 났다...
first_translate: on top of that,  many villages were affected, resulting in loss of lives...

hangle: 심지어 영지 주변에 광폭화된 마물이 많아져 다른 영지도 애를 먹고 있음…
first_translate: there are also reports of monsters becoming violent near territories, causing trouble elsewhere...
seriously?
since the request came directly from the imperial family, I can’t say no.

hangle: 이렇게 된 거 열심히 해서 사람들을 돕자.
first_translate: I guess I better try hard to save as many people as possible.

hangle: 유니스도 오는 것 같던데 창조주로서 모범을 보여야지.
first_translate: apparently,  eunice is coming too. as creator, I must set a good example.
my lady.
I apologize for disturbing you.
it’s okay. what brings you here?
an unknown guest arrived at the door.

hangle: 아무래도 아가씨가 구분을 해주셔야 될 것 같습니다.
first_translate: I believe you should decide whether he’s friend or foe.
excuse me?
here’s a message from master.
from duke bernhart?
“if you’re unsure, ask siegren.”
what does that mean...?
make sure to inform the prince’s palace about this visitor.
yes, my lady.
who could it possibly be...?
huh?
hm.
are you fiona halyeon?
who are you?!
